headline: Assessing HCA Healthcare (HCA) Valuation After Key Chief Nurse Executive Leadership Change
summary: Why this leadership change matters for HCA Healthcare stock HCA Healthcare (HCA) has named longtime executive Erica Rossitto as senior vice president and chief nurse executive, a leadership shift that could influence how investors think about the company’s operations and culture. Rossitto will oversee the nursing agenda for more than 100,000 nurses across HCA’s network, following the recent passing of former chief nurse executive Sammie Mosier.
